Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron sat and awaited the next attack. He thought. "if i want to improve 
I better use my ultimate form. He transformed. The gold ora was around him 
again. His optics now green. But something he felt was still missing. he had 
yet to find his full potental. In his new form he reflect and pushed off all 
shots with one finger. He needed to turn up the juice. He went to the 
machine. Dodgeing and destroying as he went. He reached the machine. He took 
a look under the board. He connected one circut from his own arm and the 
potential of gravity increased dramaticly. He chose to work in 50 times 
normal gravity. It turned up. The floor sunk into the ground. Barley holding. 
He tried to turn but was shot with the lasers. he could barley move. He shot 
off some energy blasts from his hands but do to the gravity the blast went 
straight down into the earth leaving small holes. "Okay this is beter." He 
began to move and continued his training.

--part1_f6.6f02912.27a32e64_boundary
